content.question:
The city of Calais commissioned this sculpture to memorialize an event from the city’s past.

Identify the sculptor. Discuss ways in which the sculptor’s conception, which was not acceptable to city officials, broke with traditional notions of heroic sculpture.

frqParts.text:
The city of Calais commissioned this sculpture to memorialize an event from the city’s past.

Identify the sculptor. Discuss ways in which the sculptor’s conception, which was not acceptable to city officials, broke with traditional notions of heroic sculpture.

topic.text: 4.2: Purpose and Audience in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a work of art (or group of related works of art), providing-  a. title or designation.  b. name of artist.  c. culture of origin.  d. style.  e. date of creation.  f. materials.
